Entries.default: "The chorus appears to be coming through this tube. I'd say I wonder where it leads, but I'm certain we'll find out eventually."
"Usually I like to run away from the screaming."
"Let us follow the screams to the source and choke it off."
"Screams be reminding me of a... well, of a few things, actually."
"In the name of Gaun, shut up already!"
"Who is down there making such an unholy noise?"
"HELLO, MY FRIEND. WHY ARE YOU SCREAMING?"
"This whole sanctum is a factory of screams."
"Yes, yes, keep screaming. I'm certain somebody cares."
